summary: This is a follower called pinkie in the 4 shields tavern.
descriptionHtml:
This follower has a bow at first but you can change what ever you like on her so you dont have to have the same armor or weapons.

If you find a problem please comment and if you like the mod then comment on it :) Pinkie is lonely and needs a friend to look after her.

If you use Amazing follower tweaks as you can level her up when you level up so she is stronger. And there is loads of things you can do with it.

Also you could use UFO.
author: oOVenomOo
